systems.name: Tank Garage System
systems.description: Primary interface for managing tanks, artifacts, and customizations.
systems.mechanics: Players interact with UI elements to view tank stats, customize appearance, and set default tanks.
systems.objectives: Enable players to manage and customize their tanks efficiently.
interactions: View tank stats by holding on specific UI elements.
Customize tank appearance using Wrap, Decal, and Sticker options.
Set a default tank for use outside the garage.

systems.name: Tank Decor System
systems.description: Sub-system within Tank Garage for customizing tank appearance.
systems.mechanics: Players select from Wrap, Decal, Sticker, and Custom options to modify tank aesthetics.
systems.objectives: Provide tools for aesthetic customization of tanks.
interactions: Apply wraps to change overall tank appearance.
Add decals to specific parts of the tank.
Place stickers freely on the tank surface.

logic_rules.description: Players can view detailed tank stats by interacting with specific UI elements.
logic_rules.trigger: Player holds/taps on tank stat indicators.

logic_rules.description: Players can designate a tank as their default tank for use outside the garage.
logic_rules.effect: Selected tank becomes the default tank.

logic_rules.description: Players can modify the visual appearance of their tanks using various customization options.
logic_rules.trigger: Player interacts with Wrap, Decal, or Sticker tabs.
logic_rules.effect: Tank appearance is updated based on selected options.
